revised_title: Harold Munro Fox: A Pioneering Zoologist and Educator
tldr: Harold Munro Fox was a renowned zoologist and educator who made significant contributions to the field of zoology, particularly in the areas of marine biology and evolutionary biology. He was a dedicated researcher, editor, and librarian, and his passion for science and education led him to travel extensively and communicate with scientists from various countries. Fox held several important positions in universities and was known for his ability to create a vibrant and supportive teaching environment.
